properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh deeper yet I pray (O deeper yet I pray - deeper yet I pray) And higher ev'ry day (And higher ev'ry day - higher ev'ry day) And wiser blessed Lord (And wiser blessed Lord - wiser blessed Lord) In Thy precious holy Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deeper deeper in the love of Jesus Daily let me go Higher higher in the school of wisdom More of grace to know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deeper deeper blessed Holy Spirit Take me deeper still Till my life is wholly lost in Jesus And His perfect will{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deeper deeper tho' it cost hard trials Deeper let me go Rooted in the holy love of Jesus Let me fruitful grow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
